description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Salzburg, Austria. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Salzburg Adults-Only Heritage Luxury with Rooftop Terrace
hotels.description: Enjoy a sophisticated escape staying at the adults-only Hotel Stein, in the historic centre of Salzburg in the Austrian Alps. This iconic hotel has a history dating to the Middle Ages, and today offers contemporary luxury on the banks of the Salzach River. Head up to the rooftop for breakfast or a cocktail with spellbinding views of the city, before exploring the sights just minutes from your door: explore Mozart's birthplace and residence, walk through the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Old Town and see Mirabell Palace.

seo.title: Hotel a Salzburg - Austria Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Salzburg, Austria con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
